title: Learner-Centered Workshop for Strengthening Core Competencies in Digital Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A short-term course focused on intensively developing digital system operation and management competencies for learners in administrative/leadership roles. Requires case-based education applicable to real-life scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and components of digital systems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve digital circuit design problems in puzzle-based quizzes with over 70% accuracy while enhancing collaborative learning skills.
Learners can create visual materials of digital system simulation results using a graphic tablet.

resources: Quiz Platform Account (Supports Class-Scale Simultaneous Access)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
